alert.note: Alert for Otoe (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 14 at 3:50AM CST until February 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph with blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...In Iowa, Montgomery, Fremont and Page Counties. In Nebraska, Otoe County. * WHEN...From late Wednesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and reduced visibility.The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening or Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Consider adjusting travel plans if needed.
